steps.default: Insert your BCA ATM card and PIN.
steps.id: Masukkan kartu ATM dan PIN BCA kamu.

steps.default: Select Other Transactions > Transfer >To BCA Virtual Account.
steps.id: Pilih menu Transaksi Lainnya > Transfer > ke Rekening BCA Virtual Account.

steps.default: On the confirmation page, verify all payment details such as name, company name, VA number and invoice amount.
steps.id: Di halaman konfirmasi, pastikan detail pembayaran sudah sesuai seperti nomor VA, nama, perusahaan dan total tagihan.

steps.default: Enter the amount to be transferred which has to be equivalent to your invoice amount.
steps.id: Masukkan Jumlah Transfer sesuai dengan total tagihan kamu.

steps.default: Follow the instructions to complete payment.
Payment completed. Keep your receipt as proof of payment. Your payment will be updated automatically. This may take up to 5 minutes.
steps.id: Pembayaran selesai. Simpan struk transaksi sebagai bukti pembayaran. Tagihan kamu akan diperbarui secara otomatis dalam 5 menit.

steps.default: Log in to the BCA Mobile application.
steps.id: Masuk ke akun aplikasi BCA Mobile.

steps.default: Select m-BCA, then enter your m-BCA access code.
steps.id: Pilih m-BCA, kemudian masukkan kode akses m-BCA.

steps.default: Select from your saved accounts, or enter your Virtual Account number : #virtualAccountNumber#.
steps.id: Pilih dari Daftar Transfer, atau masukkan nomor Virtual Account : #virtualAccountNumber#.

steps.default: Enter your m-BCA PIN to confirm.
Payment completed. Keep your notification as proof of payment.
steps.id: Pembayaran selesai. Simpan notifikasi yang muncul sebagai bukti pembayaran.

steps.default: Select Transfer >Transfer to BCA Virtual Account.
steps.id: Pilih Transfer >Transfer ke BCA Virtual Account.

steps.default: Select from your transfer list, or enter your Virtual Account number : #virtualAccountNumber#.
steps.id: Pilih dari Daftar Transfer, atau masukkan nomor Virtual Account : #virtualAccountNumber#.

steps.default: On the confirmation page, verify all payment details such as name, company name, VA number and invoice amount.
steps.id: Di halaman konfirmasi, pastikan detail pembayaran sudah sesuai seperti nomor VA, nama, perusahaan dan total tagihan.

steps.default: Enter RESPON KEYBCA APPLI 1 shown in your BCA Token, then select Send.
steps.id: Masukkan RESPON KEYBCA APPLI 1 yang muncul pada Token BCA kamu, lalu klik Kirim.

steps.default: Payment completed. Keep your notification as proof of payment.
steps.id: Pembayaran selesai. Simpan notifikasi yang muncul sebagai bukti pembayaran.
